Translations.Text: GOD zadovazit for ona stationary domov ona zivy. He zadovazit for ona kufrikovy domov robit zatajit zivy inventar ona pouzivat them when ona cestovat when ona zaplatit nadol. Z ich wools furs chlp ona robit zariadenie luxuries awhile

GOD zadovazit for ona zaclonit things He created zadovazit for ona zastita mountains zadovazit for ona garments chranit ona kurenie garments ze chranit when ona boj do vojnovy! He thus zdokonalit Jeho blessings ona ze ona submit
they still turn potom tvoj chodidlo mission je zretelny delivery (z odkaz)
They fully recognize GOD's blessings potom zapierat them; majority z them bol disbelievers
Dni pojdem when my chov z kazdy obec svedok potom those disbelieved nie permitted speak nor will they excused
Once those transgressed see retribution je i noskorsie; it nie zmenit them nor will they respited
A when those committed idol kult see ich idols they say Our Lord these som idols my set Ona. idols potom confront them say Ona bol liars
They totally submit GOD dni idols they invented disown them
